001
002package com.commercetools.compat;
003
004import java.net.URI;
005import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
006import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
007import java.util.concurrent.CompletionException;
008import java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage;
009
010import com.commercetools.api.client.ProjectApiRoot;
011import com.commercetools.api.defaultconfig.ApiRootBuilder;
012import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.type.TypeReference;
013import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JavaType;
014import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode;
015import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;
016
017import io.sphere.sdk.client.*;
018import io.sphere.sdk.http.HttpHeaders;
019import io.sphere.sdk.http.HttpRequest;
020import io.sphere.sdk.http.HttpResponse;
021import io.sphere.sdk.json.JsonException;
022import io.sphere.sdk.json.SphereJsonUtils;
023import io.sphere.sdk.models.SphereException;
024import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.*;
025import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.oauth2.ClientCredentials;
026
027public class CompatSphereClient extends AutoCloseableService implements SphereClient {
028    private final ApiHttpClient client;
029
030    private final String projectKey;
031
032    private final ObjectMapper mapper;
033
034    private final ExceptionMode exceptionMode;
035
036    private CompatSphereClient(final ApiHttpClient apiHttpClient, final ObjectMapper mapper, final String projectKey,
037            final ExceptionMode exceptionMode) {
038        this.projectKey = projectKey;
039        this.mapper = mapper;
040        this.client = new CompatApiHttpClient(apiHttpClient, mapper);
041        this.exceptionMode = exceptionMode;
042    }
043
044    public ProjectApiRoot apiRoot() {
045        return ProjectApiRoot.fromClient(projectKey, client);
046    }
047
048    public ApiHttpClient getClient() {
049        return client;
050    }
051
052    public String getProjectKey() {
053        return projectKey;
054    }
055
056    public ExceptionMode getExceptionMode() {
057        return exceptionMode;
058    }
059
060    public ObjectMapper getMapper() {
061        return mapper;
062    }
063
064    /**
065     * creates an instance of the CompatSphereClient. Please be aware for backwards compatibility the v2 Exceptions are thrown
066     * @param clientConfig client configuration
067     * @return SphereClient using a SDK v2 ApiHttpClient as HTTP client
068     */
069    public static CompatSphereClient of(SphereClientConfig clientConfig) {
070        return of(createDefaultClient(clientConfig), SphereJsonUtils.newObjectMapper(), clientConfig.getProjectKey(),
071            ExceptionMode.SDK_V2);
072    }
073
074    /**
075     * Wraps an ApiHttpClient in a SDK v1 compatible SphereClient. SDKv1 Exceptions are thrown
076     * @param apiRoot the ApiRoot with the underlying ApiHttpClient to be used
077     * @return SphereClient using a SDK v2 ApiHttpClient as HTTP client
078     */
079    public static CompatSphereClient of(final ProjectApiRoot apiRoot) {
080        return of(apiRoot.getApiHttpClient(), SphereJsonUtils.newObjectMapper(), apiRoot.getProjectKey(),
081            ExceptionMode.SDK_V1);
082    }
083
084    /**
085     * Wraps an ApiHttpClient in a SDK v1 compatible SphereClient. SDKv1 Exceptions are thrown
086     * @param apiRoot the ApiRoot with the underlying ApiHttpClient to be used
087     * @param mapper Jackson ObjectMapper to be used for deserialization
088     * @return SphereClient using a SDK v2 ApiHttpClient as HTTP client
089     */
090    public static CompatSphereClient of(final ProjectApiRoot apiRoot, final ObjectMapper mapper) {
091        return of(apiRoot.getApiHttpClient(), mapper, apiRoot.getProjectKey(), ExceptionMode.SDK_V1);
092    }
093
094    /**
095     * Wraps an ApiHttpClient in a SDK v1 compatible SphereClient. SDKv1 Exceptions are thrown
096     * @param apiHttpClient the underlying ApiHttpClient to be used
097     * @return SphereClient using a SDK v2 ApiHttpClient as HTTP client
098     */
099    public static CompatSphereClient of(final ApiHttpClient apiHttpClient, final String projectKey) {
100        return of(apiHttpClient, SphereJsonUtils.newObjectMapper(), projectKey, ExceptionMode.SDK_V1);
101    }
102
103    /**
104     * Wraps an ApiHttpClient in a SDK v1 compatible SphereClient. SDKv1 Exceptions are thrown
105     * @param apiHttpClient the underlying ApiHttpClient to be used
106     * @param projectKey the project key to be used
107     * @param mapper Jackson ObjectMapper to be used for deserialization
108     * @return SphereClient using a SDK v2 ApiHttpClient as HTTP client
109     */
110    public static CompatSphereClient of(final ApiHttpClient apiHttpClient, final ObjectMapper mapper,
111            final String projectKey) {
112        return of(apiHttpClient, mapper, projectKey, ExceptionMode.SDK_V1);
113    }
114
115    /**
116     * Wraps an ApiHttpClient in a SDK v1 compatible SphereClient. SDKv1 Exceptions are thrown
117     * @param clientConfig client configuration
118     * @param exceptionMode SDKv1 or SDKv2 exceptions to be used
119     * @return SphereClient using a SDK v2 ApiHttpClient as HTTP client
120     */
121    public static CompatSphereClient of(SphereClientConfig clientConfig, final ExceptionMode exceptionMode) {
122        return of(createDefaultClient(clientConfig), SphereJsonUtils.newObjectMapper(), clientConfig.getProjectKey(),
123            exceptionMode);
124    }
125
126    /**
127     * Wraps an ApiHttpClient in a SDK v1 compatible SphereClient. SDKv1 Exceptions are thrown
128     * @param apiRoot the ApiRoot with the underlying ApiHttpClient to be used
129     * @param exceptionMode SDKv1 or SDKv2 exceptions to be used
130     * @return SphereClient using a SDK v2 ApiHttpClient as HTTP client
131     */
132    public static CompatSphereClient of(final ProjectApiRoot apiRoot, final ExceptionMode exceptionMode) {
133        return of(apiRoot.getApiHttpClient(), SphereJsonUtils.newObjectMapper(), apiRoot.getProjectKey(),
134            exceptionMode);
135    }
136
137    /**
138     * Wraps an ApiHttpClient in a SDK v1 compatible SphereClient. SDKv1 Exceptions are thrown
139     * @param apiRoot the ApiRoot with the underlying ApiHttpClient to be used
140     * @param mapper Jackson ObjectMapper to be used for deserialization
141     * @param exceptionMode SDKv1 or SDKv2 exceptions to be used
142     * @return SphereClient using a SDK v2 ApiHttpClient as HTTP client
143     */
144    public static CompatSphereClient of(final ProjectApiRoot apiRoot, final ObjectMapper mapper,
145            final ExceptionMode exceptionMode) {
146        return of(apiRoot.getApiHttpClient(), mapper, apiRoot.getProjectKey(), exceptionMode);
147    }
148
149    /**
150     * Wraps an ApiHttpClient in a SDK v1 compatible SphereClient. SDKv1 Exceptions are thrown
151     * @param apiHttpClient the underlying ApiHttpClient to be used
152     * @param projectKey project key to be used
153     * @param exceptionMode SDKv1 or SDKv2 exceptions to be used
154     * @return SphereClient using a SDK v2 ApiHttpClient as HTTP client
155     */
156    public static CompatSphereClient of(final ApiHttpClient apiHttpClient, final String projectKey,
157            final ExceptionMode exceptionMode) {
158        return of(apiHttpClient, SphereJsonUtils.newObjectMapper(), projectKey, exceptionMode);
159    }
160
161    /**
162     * Wraps an ApiHttpClient in a SDK v1 compatible SphereClient. SDKv1 Exceptions are thrown
163     * @param apiHttpClient the underlying ApiHttpClient to be used
164     * @param projectKey the project key to be used
165     * @param mapper Jackson ObjectMapper to be used for deserialization
166     * @param exceptionMode SDKv1 or SDKv2 exceptions to be used
167     * @return SphereClient using a SDK v2 ApiHttpClient as HTTP client
168     */
169    public static CompatSphereClient of(final ApiHttpClient apiHttpClient, final ObjectMapper mapper,
170            final String projectKey, final ExceptionMode exceptionMode) {
171        return new CompatSphereClient(apiHttpClient, mapper, projectKey, exceptionMode);
172    }
173
174    private static ApiHttpClient createDefaultClient(SphereClientConfig clientConfig) {
175        final URI resolve = URI.create(clientConfig.getApiUrl()).resolve("/" + clientConfig.getProjectKey() + "/");
176        return ApiRootBuilder.of()
177                .defaultClient(resolve)
178                .addCorrelationIdProvider(() -> clientConfig.getCorrelationIdGenerator().get())
179                .withClientCredentialsFlow(ClientCredentials.of()
180                        .withClientId(clientConfig.getClientId())
181                        .withClientSecret(clientConfig.getClientSecret())
182                        .build(),
183                    URI.create(clientConfig.getAuthUrl()).resolve("/oauth/token"))
184                .buildClient();
185    }
186
187    @Override
188    public <T> CompletionStage<T> execute(SphereRequest<T> sphereRequest) {
189        final CompatRequest<JsonNode> compatRequest = CompatRequest.of(client, projectKey, sphereRequest,
190            JsonNode.class);
191        final HttpRequest httpRequest = sphereRequest.httpRequestIntent().toHttpRequest(client.getBaseUri().toString());
192
193        if (exceptionMode == ExceptionMode.SDK_V2) {
194            return compatRequest.send()
195                    .thenApply(response -> HttpResponse.of(response.getStatusCode(), response.getBody(), httpRequest,
196                        HttpHeaders.ofMapEntryList(response.getHeaders().getHeaders())))
197                    .thenApplyAsync(sphereRequest::deserialize);
198        }
199        final CompletableFuture<T> result = new CompletableFuture<>();
200        compatRequest.send()
201                .thenApply(response -> HttpResponse.of(response.getStatusCode(), response.getBody(), httpRequest,
202                    HttpHeaders.ofMapEntryList(response.getHeaders().getHeaders())))
203                .whenComplete((httpResponse, throwable) -> {
204                    if (throwable != null) {
205                        Throwable cause = throwable instanceof CompletionException ? throwable.getCause() : throwable;
206                        if (cause instanceof ApiHttpException) {
207                            ApiHttpResponse<byte[]> errorResponse = ((ApiHttpException) cause).getResponse();
208                            if (errorResponse != null) {
209                                HttpResponse httpErrorResponse = HttpResponse.of(errorResponse.getStatusCode(),
210                                    errorResponse.getBody(), httpRequest,
211                                    HttpHeaders.ofMapEntryList(errorResponse.getHeaders().getHeaders()));
212                                Throwable e = createExceptionFor(httpErrorResponse, sphereRequest, mapper, projectKey,
213                                    httpRequest);
214                                result.completeExceptionally(e);
215                            }
216                            else {
217                                result.completeExceptionally(cause);
218                            }
219                        }
220                    }
221                    try {
222                        result.complete(sphereRequest.deserialize(httpResponse));
223                    }
224                    catch (final JsonException e) {
225                        final byte[] bytes = httpResponse.getResponseBody();
226                        e.addNote("Cannot parse " + bytesToString(bytes));
227                        result.completeExceptionally(e);
228                    }
229                });
230        return result;
231    }
232
233    public enum ExceptionMode {
234        SDK_V1, SDK_V2
235    }
236
237    private static <T> SphereException createExceptionFor(final HttpResponse httpResponse,
238            final SphereRequest<T> sphereRequest, final ObjectMapper objectMapper, final String projectKey,
239            final HttpRequest httpRequest) {
240        final SphereException sphereException = CompatExceptionFactory.of()
241                .createException(httpResponse, sphereRequest, objectMapper);
242        fillExceptionWithData(sphereRequest, httpResponse, sphereException, projectKey, httpRequest);
243        return sphereException;
244    }
245
246    private static <T> void fillExceptionWithData(final SphereRequest<T> sphereRequest, final HttpResponse httpResponse,
247            final SphereException exception, final String projectKey, final HttpRequest httpRequest) {
248        exception.setSphereRequest(sphereRequest);
249        exception.setUnderlyingHttpResponse(httpResponse);
250        exception.setProjectKey(projectKey);
251        exception.setHttpRequest(httpRequest);
252    }
253
254    private static String bytesToString(final byte[] b) {
255        return new String(b, StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
256    }
257
258    @Override
259    protected void internalClose() {
260        closeQuietly(client);
261    }
262
263    @Override
264    public SphereApiConfig getConfig() {
265        return new SphereApiConfig() {
266            @Override
267            public String getApiUrl() {
268                return client.getBaseUri().toString();
269            }
270
271            @Override
272            public String getProjectKey() {
273                return projectKey;
274            }
275
276            @Override
277            public CorrelationIdGenerator getCorrelationIdGenerator() {
278                return null;
279            }
280        };
281    }
282
283    public static class CompatApiHttpClient extends AutoCloseableService implements ApiHttpClient {
284        private final ApiHttpClient apiHttpClient;
285        private final ResponseSerializer serializer;
286
287        public CompatApiHttpClient(ApiHttpClient apiHttpClient, ObjectMapper mapper) {
288            this.apiHttpClient = apiHttpClient;
289            this.serializer = ResponseSerializer.of(mapper);
290        }
291
292        @Override
293        public URI getBaseUri() {
294            return apiHttpClient.getBaseUri();
295        }
296
297        @Override
298        public <O> CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<O>> execute(final ClientRequestCommand<O> method) {
299            return method.execute(this);
300        }
301
302        @Override
303        public <O> CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<O>> execute(final ApiHttpRequest request,
304                final Class<O> outputType) {
305            return execute(request).thenApply(response -> serializer.convertResponse(response, outputType));
306        }
307
308        @Override
309        public <O> CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<O>> execute(final ApiHttpRequest request,
310                final TypeReference<O> outputType) {
311            return execute(request).thenApply(response -> serializer.convertResponse(response, outputType));
312        }
313
314        @Override
315        public <O> CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<O>> execute(final ApiHttpRequest request,
316                final JavaType outputType) {
317            return execute(request).thenApply(response -> serializer.convertResponse(response, outputType));
318        }
319
320        @Override
321        public ResponseSerializer getSerializerService() {
322            return serializer;
323        }
324
325        @Override
326        public CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>> execute(ApiHttpRequest request) {
327            return apiHttpClient.execute(request);
328        }
329
330        @Override
331        protected void internalClose() {
332            closeQuietly(apiHttpClient);
333        }
334    }
335}
